decision_conditions: in accordance with plans: JP7102-Mo/001 SITE PLAN REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/002 EXISTING AND PROPOSED BLOCK PLAN REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/003 PROPOSED EXTENSION LAYOUT REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/004 ARCHITECTURE LAYOUT REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/005 ARCHITECTURE LAYOUT REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/006 ARCHITECTURE LAYOUT REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/007 FRONT ELEVATION OF EXTENSION REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/008 REAR ELEVATION OF EXTENSION REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/009 SIDE ELEVATION OF EXTENSION REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/010 SECTION C-C' OF EXTENSION REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/011 SECTION D-D' OF EXTENSION REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/012 SECTION E-E' REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/013 OUT BUILD GYM LAYOUT REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/014 OUT BUILD ROOF PLAN REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/015 SECTION OF OUT GYM REV A 15/06/25; JP7102-Mo/016 ELEVATIONS OF OUT GYM REV A 15/06/25
description: Detached rear outbuilding. Single storey rear extension. Loft conversion with a rear dormer. Hip to gable roof alterations. Two front roof lights. (Summary).
